attributes.action: Could you please recommend the United Nation to help the wikipedia?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Respected Sir,

          The wikipedia is a good teacher to many people and especially students. As it is a non-profit academic activity, it is purely depends on public donations. Please visit:
http://wikimediafoundation.org/wiki/Five_Facts_about_Wikipedia/uk  
As a user of wiki I request you to help it through the UK government or through the United Nations. 

Thank You.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
